flawed_nl_solution:
After losing some socks, Caroline has 40 - 4 = <<40-4=31>>31 pairs of socks
Caroline donates 31 * (2/3) = <<31*2/3=62/3>>62/3 pairs of socks to the thrift store
After donating some socks, Caroline has 31 - 62/3 = <<31-62/3=31/3>>31/3 pairs of socks remaining
After getting new socks, Caroline has 31/3 + 10 + 3 = <<31/3+10+3=70/3>>70/3 pairs of socks
#### 70/3

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36, not 31. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
